text:
Company: Herrera, Cook and Rose  
Role: Rail-Track Laying and Maintenance Equipment Operator  

Company Background:  
Herrera, Cook and Rose is a leading provider of railway infrastructure services, dedicated to maintaining and improving rail networks across the globe. With a commitment to safety and excellence, we seek skilled professionals to join our dynamic team.

Job Description:  
We are looking for a qualified Rail-Track Laying and Maintenance Equipment Operator to join our operations team. The ideal candidate will possess the necessary experience in rail-track maintenance and demonstrate a high level of competency in operating specialized equipment.

Responsibilities:  
- Operate and maintain rail-track laying and maintenance equipment.
- Inspect and ensure the equipment is in safe working order.
- Collaborate with team members to complete rail infrastructure projects on time.
- Adhere to safety protocols and regulations at all times.
- Perform periodic maintenance and troubleshoot equipment issues.

Qualifications and Experience:  
- Proven experience in rail-track laying and maintenance.
- Proficiency in operating and maintaining relevant equipment.
- Strong understanding of safety standards and practices.
- Ability to work both independently and as part of a team.
- Reliable and capable candidates encouraged to apply.

Perks and Benefits:  
- Competitive salary: £30,000 to £45,000 annually, based on experience and skills.
- Comprehensive health and dental insurance.
- Paid time off and family leave.
- Opportunities for professional development and training.
- Supportive and inclusive work environment.

Qualified individuals are invited to apply. We are committed to fair and equitable pay practices.

How to Apply:  
Interested candidates should submit their resume and cover letter highlighting their relevant experience and skills.

Application Deadline:  
Applications will be reviewed on a rolling basis until the position is filled.
